rawText:
Nithish Kumar
+91 9025105082|iamnithish100@gmail.com|linkedin.com/in/nithishkumar2002|github.com/Nithish-2012002
SUMMARY
Highly motivated and detail-oriented Software Engineer with a strong foundation inReact,Node.js, andSQL. Proficient in
building scalable and responsive web applications, crafting efficient backend solutions, and designing robust database
systems. Adept at collaborating in team environments and leveraging problem-solving skills to deliver innovative and
user-centric software solutions. Passionate about learning and staying updated with the latest technologies to drive
impactful results.
TECHNICAL SKILLS
Programming Languages: Java, Python, JavaScript, SQL
Technologies:HTML, CSS, Tailwind CSS JavaScript (ES6+), Node.js, React, SQL,Git
Backend Skills: Node.js, Express.js, RESTful APIs, Authentication (JWT/OAuth)
PROJECTS
EEEZOOct 2024 – Present
An Recruitement PortalReact.js, Node.js, SQL
•Developed dynamic and responsive web interfaces usingReact.jsandTailwind CSS
to enhance user experience.
•Implemented seamless API integration to efficiently fetch and display backend data.
EvotingMay 2024 – Oct 2024
InGovern Research ServicesHTML, Node.js, SQL,Ajax
•Developed an end-to-end web application with six user login profiles, each having
different levels of authorization.
•Contributed to developing responsive web pages and backend logic usingNode.jsandAJAXto fetch and display dynamic data.
EXPERIENCE
Software Development EngineerApril 2024 – present
Nirals Information Technologies Pvt.LmtKovilpatti ,India
•Developing and deploying software applications for various Clients
Software Engineer InternSep 2022 – Feb 2023
Cogniot Technologies Pvt.lmtKovilpatti, India
•Developed Web Pages, Built Deep learning Projects
EDUCATION
National Engineering CollegeKovilpatti, India
B.E. in Computer Science and EngineeringAug 2020 – Apr 2024
CERTIFICATIONS
•Scaler Certified Node.Js Professional
•Infosys Springboard - Javascript Certification
•NPTEL - Cloud Computing
